name: LD50_WitchsEnd
description:
Witch's End

The Witches’ Realm is coming to an end. Make the most of your remaining time, delay your end by fighting back the invading demons, until inevitably you will have to submit yourself to the long dark.

Controls:

Action - Left Mouse Button

Ludum Dare 50 (2022)

Entry by Eero Höök

Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Theme usage: The World is ending from each side of the player and eventually will catch up to the player. The player can delay this end by leveling up and upgrading their powers.

Genre: 2D Side-scrolling Shooter

Made in:

GameMaker

Features:

- Lovely pixel art visuals

- 1 Linear Level

- Smooth Addictive Browser Gameplay

Support the Dev:

paypal.me/roikkudev
